data.name: Get Toasted!
data.detailed_description:
In this 3rd Person low Poly game you will play against 9 other Teams to get that Slimeyy Win. You can play in Solo,Duo,Trio or Squad.

Round based Battle Royal?

This Game hast 10 Teams Battle for the win trough Team vs Team Minigames and Lobbygames where you battle against all Teams. Each mode will be rated to find who is the real Slimeyy Champion.

Minigames?

You are going to play various Minigames in one Game. The Minigames are a wild mix between strategy and fun Challenges. Replay games that you loved to play in your childhood in another way. There are parkur Minigames where you have to finish first. There are Boxing like Game modes where you go head to head against you opponents. And there even are Game modes like Fire, Water,Thunder and tons more...


[Wishlist]
If you like our game or find it interesting you are welcome to add it to your "Wishlist". We are happy about every new player

data.short_description: Relaxing metroidvania platformer with a lot to collect. Set in a happy and colorfull toast metroidvania world!

pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 420 GB available space
